com.kukri.moviecatalog.model.MovieDTO

    • Uses of MovieDTO in com.kukri.moviecatalog.controller

      Methods in com.kukri.moviecatalog.controller that return types with arguments of type MovieDTO 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<MovieDTO> MovieController.getAllMovies()
      Retrieves all movies as DTOs.
      List<MovieDTO> MovieController.getMoviesByDirector(String name)
      Retrieves movies by director name.
      List<MovieDTO> MovieController.getMoviesByRatingThreshold(int minScore)
      Retrieves movies with average rating above a given threshold.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Retrieves movies by director name.
